summary: Implements a command‑line program that builds, trains and evaluates graph neural network models (GCN and GraphSAGE variants) for link‑prediction tasks on OGB datasets using DGL and PyTorch. It defines convolutional layers, a link predictor, a logging utility, and the training/evaluation workflow.
business_intent: Provide an example and reference implementation for researchers and engineers to benchmark NGNN‑based graph neural networks on standard link‑prediction datasets, facilitating reproducible experiments and performance comparison.
